CustomField.description: The description provided to the bank or payment provider for use on the bank statement of the debitor. When using a payment provider be sure to always have this field contain the name of the organisation. As this is not otherwise displayed on the bank statement.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The description provided to the debitor. When using a payment provider be sure to always have this field contain the name of the organisation. As this is not otherwise displayed on the bankstatement.
CustomField.label: Default Bank Statement Description
